title: How to Draw Medusa

steps.headline: Begin by sketching a skeletal guideline to base your drawing off of.
steps.description: In this case, Medusa will be drawn with the torso of a woman and the tail of a snake.

steps.headline: Use shapes as guides for your drawing as shown.
Sketch her upper body.
steps.description: Remember that you're drawing a woman, so pay attention to proportions!

steps.headline: Draw small snakes instead of hair on her head.
Add accessories.
steps.description: You can stick with just jewelry here, or you can add armor, a sword, or a bow and arrow.

steps.headline: Outline her with permanent media such as ink or paint.
steps.description: Don't forget to erase your pencil guidelines.

text: Begin by sketching a skeletal guideline to base your drawing off of. In this case, Medusa will be drawn with the torso of a woman and the tail of a snake. Use shapes as guides for your drawing as shown.  Sketch her upper body. Remember that you're drawing a woman, so pay attention to proportions! Draw small snakes instead of hair on her head.  Add accessories. You can stick with just jewelry here, or you can add armor, a sword, or a bow and arrow. Add detail her lower half.  Outline her with permanent media such as ink or paint. Don't forget to erase your pencil guidelines. Color Medusa and you're done!
